Title: Sisterhood
Writer: Michael Brandt (developed by), Derek Haas (developed by), Dick Wolf (created by), Matt Olmstead (created by), Rick Eid, Katherine Visconti, Gwen Sigan (story editor)
Actors: Jason Beghe, Jon Seda, Jesse Lee Soffer, Tracy Spiridakos
Plot: Intelligence tracks down a vigilante killing rapists and Burgess questions whether the men who attacked her sister have really been punished.
